mapper.select: SELECT PLACE_ID, NAME, PHONE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_AGE, END_AGE, WITH_WHOM, FLOOR, LOCATION, TYPE, CATEGORY, THEME1, THEME2, THEME3, WEIGHT1, WEIGHT2, WEIGHT3 FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_ID > 0 ORDER BY PLACE_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE(PLACE_ID, NAME, PHONE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_AGE, END_AGE, WITH_WHOM, FLOOR, LOCATION, TYPE, CATEGORY, THEME1, THEME2, THEME3, WEIGHT1, WEIGHT2, WEIGHT3) VALUES (PLACE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{startAge}, #{endAge}, #{withWhom}, #{floor}, #{location}, #{type}, #{category}, #{theme1}, #{theme2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theme3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight1, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=_int}, #{weight2, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=_int}, #{weight3, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=_int})
